name: Atomic Launcher
description:
This game was created for Jam 4 a Cause!

Controls: A and D (or left and right arrows) to aim, space to shoot, C to change current element

Contributors:

Michael Capra (Pro_Amateur), Ethan Adler (epadler), Tom Slavin (), Wren Bernstein (OneRedShoe), and John Vance (ExpCake)
